description.@en: The most important part of an Ogreâ€™s biology is their gut. Their heavily muscled bellies contain most of their vital organs. Their stomachs are also monstrously powerful and able to digest nearly anything, a natural mutation resulting from generations of extreme gluttony.

effect.@en: You can gain sustenance from eating literally anything, including inanimate objects. This protects you from starvation entirely, as described in Chapter 9: Hazards & Healing.
